string.value: I think #b#p9010010##k has something special for me.
#b#p9010010##k says I can trade in a scroll for a scroll cast with her magic spell, which will increase my Success Rate by 5%. I must make wise decisions, since I can only trade 5 times today.
#b#p9010010##k has given me a scroll with a higher success rate in return. She's got a kind heart.

The Spirit Week Event! I, Cassandra, am casting a magic spell on regular scrolls every Monday in October, which will increase the Success Rate by 5%. But once I cast a magic spell on your scroll, you won't be able to trade it. What do you say? Would you like to try?

I'll #rcast a magic spell and increase the Success Rate by 5%#k if you bring me a scroll with 10% or 60% success rate. So, decide on a scroll you'd like and come talk to me. You can trade in a scroll of your choice by selecting #bCast a Magic Spell#k. Make sure you make the right decision, though, since you can only trade 5 times.
Casting magic on scrolls is harder than it looks, which is why I'm only offering it every Monday of October. Come and see me on a Monday in October if you change your mind.
